basics.name: Nik Korablin
basics.label: Full-stack JS Engineer
basics.summary: Experienced Engineering Manager and Full-stack JavaScript Engineer with a proven track record of leading high-performing teams and delivering scalable, data-driven solutions. Skilled in React, Node.js, TypeScript, and cloud-native architectures. Adept at optimizing search technologies, building robust A/B testing frameworks, and driving product innovation. Value  writing clean, testable code and mentoring engineers to achieve their full potential.

work.name: The Knot
highlights: Manage a team of 6 engineers
Work on a large-scale React eCommerce platform
Focused on product search using Algolia and migrating to ElasticSearch lowering cost and complexity
Transitioned to a variant-based data model to unlock more product types
Developed an A/B testing library doubling the team's experiment throughput

work.name: iFIT
highlights: Worked as the lead engineer on a team of 6 engineers
Developed React front-end applications for embedded devices
Built TypeScript microservices on AWS Lambda
Focused on good, testable code

work.name: Stealth mode Fin-tech start up
highlights: Helped build a financial research app from the ground up
NodeJS, React, Electron, RethinkDB
Built an interactive chat feature
Worked with real-time ticker data

work.name: WhoseYourLandlord.com
highlights: Landlord review platform that facilitated feedback for renters, enabling better rental decision-making
Built the entire application from scratch
Built with Ruby on Rails and React
Managed a few junior developers

work.name: Vanguard Group
highlights: Worked on a retail advice platform
Enterprise-scale Java application
AngularJS front end
Wrote unit tests and end-to-end tests using Cucumber

work.name: WebTek
highlights: Developed websites for small and large businesses
WordPress, eCommerce
